description: News and reaction to the impact of coronavirus on Jersey and other top stories.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey updates and other news 10-14 August
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey updates and other news 10-14 August - BBC News
maintext:
A World War Two hand grenade has been recovered from the boot of a person's car in Jersey.
The States of Jersey Police said the driver had discovered it at home where it had been for "decades" and was taking it to the police station.
The force said the "high explosives" had been safely removed from the vehicle while it was parked at the QE2 Ferry Terminal and would be disposed of.
It urged islanders to always leave any old military items in the place they are found, and call the police immediately.
